question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: Kādu jaunu nosaukumu saistībā ar UNESCO 2021. gadā ieguva Bath?
answer: 2021. gadā Bath tika piešķirts jauns UNESCO nosaukums kā daļa no "Great Spa Towns of Europe" (Lielās Eiropas kūrvietas).
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath was awarded a new UNESCO designation as part of the "Great Spa Towns of Europe".
